Header: Kilinochchi Troops Educated on ‘Prevention of Suicides’
Content: A series of lectures on ‘Prevention of Suicides’ were conducted during 7 - 9 May for troops serving the Security Force Headquarters-Kilinochchi (SFHQ-KLN), the Forward Maintenance Area - Kilinochchi and all Divisions under the SFHQ-KLN following an initiative taken by Major General Vijitha Ravipriya, Commander, Security Forces - Kilinochchi. 24 Officers and 591 soldiers attended those lecture sessions, conducted by lecturers of the Directorate of Psychological Operations of the Sri Lanka Army and the other visiting lecturers.
